div.p: As our country continues to manage the COVID-19 emergency, Comcast is taking immediate steps to make it easier to connect low-income families to home Internet.

ul.li: New Internet Essentials customers will receive two free months of Internet service if you apply by June 30, 2020. After promotion, regular rates apply.
For all new and existing Internet Essentials customers, the speed of the program’s Internet service has increased to 25 Mbps downstream and 3 Mbps upstream.

Households with outstanding debt owed to Comcast may be eligible for Internet Essentials. We are waiving this qualification if you apply and are approved by 6/30/20. After 6/30/20, standard eligibility rules apply.

h4.data-question: Do I live in an area where I can get Internet Essentials from Comcast?
h4.a: Do I live in an area where I can get Internet Essentials from Comcast?

div.p: You must live in an area where Comcast Internet Service is available. To check if your address is eligible for service click here.

h4.data-question: Am I eligible for Internet Essentials?
h4.a: Am I eligible for Internet Essentials?

div.p: You may qualify if you:

ul.li: Are eligible for public assistance programs such as the National School Lunch Program, Housing Assistance, Medicaid, SNAP, SSI, and others.
Live in an area where Comcast Internet Service is available.
Are not an existing Xfinity Internet customer and have not subscribed to Comcast Internet within the last 90 days.

li.strong: Have no outstanding debt to Comcast that is less than one year old. Families with outstanding debt more than one year old may still be eligible.*

p.strong: *Due to the Coronavirus emergency, households with outstanding debt owed to Comcast may be eligible for Internet Essentials. We are waiving this qualification if you are approved by 6/30/20. After 6/30/20, standard eligibility rules apply.

div.p: Signing up is easy and fast from your mobile device, apply now.

h4.data-question: I am an Internet Essentials customer and I heard that speeds increased, do I need to do anything?
h4.a: I am an Internet Essentials customer and I heard that speeds increased, do I need to do anything?

div.p: No action is required for existing customers. We've automatically increased Internet speeds for the Internet Essentials service from 15/2 Mbps to 25/3 Mbps for all new and existing customers, which will be the speed of the service going forward. In this way, we will ensure that Internet Essentials customers will be able to use their Internet service for all their increased needs as a result of this health crisis.

h4.data-question: How do I get the promotion for two free months as a new customer?
h4.a: How do I get the promotion for two free months as a new customer?

div.p: If you are eligible for Internet Essentials, apply by June 30, 2020, you will automatically receive the two-month free promotion. After the promotion, regular rates apply. Internet Essentials current rate is $9.95 per month plus tax unless you disconnect your service.

h4.data-question: Once approved for Internet Essentials, how long will it take for me to receive Internet?
h4.a: Once approved for Internet Essentials, how long will it take for me to receive Internet?

p.span: If you selected a self-installation kit, please allow 5-7 days to receive your kit.

h4.data-question: Can I disconnect from Internet Essentials at any time?
h4.a: Can I disconnect from Internet Essentials at any time?

p.span: Yes, you can disconnect Internet Essentials service at any time. If you are a new customer and apply by June 30, 2020, you will receive two months free. After which, you can either cancel the service (which you can do at any time) or keep it as a regular paying Internet Essentials customer for $9.95 per month plus tax. Because there is no contract, a customer can disconnect their Internet Essentials service at any time without penalty.

h4.data-question: I am an existing Internet Essentials customer, can I get two months free?
h4.a: I am an existing Internet Essentials customer, can I get two months free?

p.span: We appreciate you being an Internet Essentials customer. Though we can’t offer you two months of free service, we are always looking for new ways to increase the value of your service and ensure that you have the tools you need to use the Internet successfully. It’s our priority that you stay connected to the Internet at home during this difficult time.
We’re automatically raising the speeds for all Internet Essentials customers at no additional cost to you, going from 15/2 to 25/3. This will remain the base speed of your service moving forward.

hotspots across the country will be available to you for free during this time, beyond the 40 hours that you already have. We want to ensure that you can use those hotspots for as long as you need to be connected.

We’re pausing our data plan so you can use your service as much as you need to during this time. With so many people working and educating from home, we want our customers to be able to access the Internet and stay connected without thinking about data plans. If you have kids, we want you to know that they can study, stream, and learn virtually, as much as they need to while schools are closed.

We will not disconnect your internet service or charge late fees if you can’t pay your bills during this time period. Contact us and let us know you can’t pay your bill, and our teams will offer flexible payment options and can help you find other solutions.

h4.data-question: What happens if I scheduled a professional installation?
h4.a: What happens if I scheduled a professional installation?

div.p:
If you had scheduled an appointment for an Xfinity tech to install Internet Essentials services, please know there have been some changes to our process due to COVID-19.
We are following the advice of our government and public health officials. To limit close contact with others as much as possible, for everyone’s safety, we will be dropping off your equipment at your door. This will include everything you need, including the equipment that was ordered and any cords and cables.
